items.title: Nut Cheese Sampler
items.descript: Cashew brie, smoked pecan asiago, and walnut cheddar. Served with assorted sliced vegetables, pumpkin seed crackers, mustard cream, and apricot chutney with dates and sage.

items.title: Oyster Mushroom and Avocado Nori Rolls
items.descript: With coconut, cashew, and cauliflower rice, wrapped in untoasted nori paper. Served with a horseradish cream and coconut amino dipping sauce.

items.title: Zucchini Summer Rolls
items.descript: Thinly sliced zucchini filled with carrot, cucumber, kelp noodles, basil, and shiitake mushrooms. Served with a sweet and sour dipping sauce.

items.title: Smoked Beet and Walnut Pate
items.descript: Served on sliced carrots and topped with red grapes and local honey.*

items.title: Enchiladas
items.descript: Red pepper and flax tortillas filled with spiced walnut “meat”, avocado, spinach, chopped tomato, and almond cheese. Topped with a cacao and ancho chile sauce.

items.title: Zucchini Parsnip and Turnip Fettuccine
items.descript: Served in a sundried tomato marinara sauce with pumpkin seed and portobello mushroom meatballs. Topped with cashew parmesan and black pepper.

items.title: Avocado Curry
items.descript: Avocado, cucumber, red pepper, and chopped spinach in a cashew curry sauce. Served with beet, carrot, and coconut rice seasoned with paprika and Jamaican allspice. Topped with a cilantro and green pea chutney.

items.title: Peanut Butter Broccoli
items.descript: Broccoli, brussel sprouts, kale, and thinly sliced jalapenos simmered in a savory ginger peanut sauce. Served with brown rice and topped with toasted peanuts.

items.title: Vermicelli Mushroom Bowl
items.descript: Rice noodles cooked in a ginger and miso broth with assorted mushrooms, potatoes, carrots, green onions, and seaweed. Topped with fresh greens.

items.title: Cashew Dumplings
items.descript: Gluten free dumplings stuffed with cashew, turnip, and red cabbage. Simmered in a red pepper and coconut broth and served over thinly sliced zucchini and spinach.

items.title: Three Potato Stew
items.descript: Golden, red, and blue potatoes, kale, carrots, and butternut squash simmered in a carrot-infused pumpkin seed milk with fresh rosemary and thyme. Served with brown rice.

items.title: Chopped Kale Salad
items.descript: With sliced brussel sprouts, avocado, cucumber, pumpkin seeds, and arugula. Tossed in a spinach and lemon vinaigrette.

items.title: Green Lentil And Spinach Salad
items.descript: With cherry tomatoes, red pepper, carrots, raw walnuts and brown rice. Tossed in a balsamic and roasted garlic dressing.

items.title: Sorbet
items.descript: Strawberry, grapefruit, and hibiscus sorbet topped with local honey.*

items.title: Tiramisu
items.descript: A raw version of the traditional dessert with almond ladyfingers, chocolate cream, cold pressed coffee, coconut cream, and vanilla-infused coffee sauce.

items.title: Banana Cream Cake
items.descript: Cinnamon and hazelnut spice cake filled with banana cream, topped with fresh bananas and mango sauce. Served with persimmon ice cream.

items.title: Black Cherry Mousse
items.descript: With lemon shortbread, vanilla cream, and fresh blackberries.
